name: The Blinky's Adventure GDevelop Prototype Archive
name_original: The Blinky's Adventure GDevelop Prototype Archive
description:
Over the past almost two years, I've been working on a game called Blinky's Adventure, a platformer where a lightling robot named Blinky has to save his friend from the evilness of british people.

Over the past year or so the game has been developed in GameMaker Studio 2, but for the first few months of the game's lifespan it was developed in GDevelop. Since this prototype for the game is long gone, why not forever preserve it on here?

The .zip folder for this prototype archive includes:

- a .zip of a playable version of the prototype

- the raw files of the prototype

- a copy of the folder i kept all of the game's files in on my old, shitty computer that i used to have

- some footage of the game that showed the prototype in development, along with some concept art!

Well that'll be it for now, enjoy the archive and stay fresh goobers! :))
